title: INC0163996 - Change wording on trade checklist for drafted players
custom_steps:
We need to change the trade checklist wording for the following scenario:

Current Logic:
IF: 
A player's Rule 4 Status is Drafted AND
The Transaction Date is before one full year from his First Year Contract Signing Date.
Display:
"The following player(s) are recent draft selections and may not be traded until one year has passed from the date the player signed his first contract."

New logic:
IF: 
A player's Rule 4 Status is Drafted AND
The Transaction Date is before 9:00 A.M ET on the day following the day that the last game of the World Series had started or 90 days from the date the player signed, whichever is later

Display:
"...recent draft selections and may not be traded until 9:00 A.M ET on the day following the day that the last game of the World Series had started or 90 days from the date the player signed, whichever is later.Â  Please confirm with MLB that this player may be assigned at this time."


Original SNOW from Jeff:
"We need to change language on TRD checklist for a drafted player who is traded in year of trade.Â  It is no longer one year.Â  How about "...recent draft selections and may not be traded until 9:00 A.M ET on the day following the day that the last game of the World Series had started or 90 days from the date the player signed, whichever is later.Â  Please confirm with MLB that this player may be assigned at this time."

Thanks"

title: Remove the league and level of play constants and make them lookups in code
custom_steps:
* Remove the constants for level of play and league and replace them with lookups which are automatically refreshed and synced with the database.  This will allow us to add them on the fly rather then requiring a new build.
* See the country lookup for an example

title: As MJC User, I want to see an Active MJC Option in Quick Search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is one of the following: 
** MJC BOC Admin ** MJC BOC Viewer ** MJC Club Admin ** MJC Club Viewer

Wire: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=quick_search_for_mjc|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=quick_search_for_mjc]
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Quick Search menu
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a new 'Active MJCs' option added to quick search
AND the search will be an auto-complete dropdwon, consisten with other search types
AND the search result line will display the player's Name, Signing Org, and Confirmed Terms Date as displayed in the wire
AND the possible player population will match the player quick search population
AND contracts returned will be the most recent MJC with a Confirmed Terms date
AND if player has no MJC, they will not be returned
AND clicking a search result will navigate the user to the chosen MJC
AND there will be a 'Search more mjcs with Advance Search' option
AND clicking this option will perform an d MJC advanced esearch for the name the user has entered
AND the advanced search will not be limited to active contracts

title: Updates to CA Signings 2<x<7
custom_steps:
Related to: EBISII-18298

â€¢	Day calculations:
o	The ML piece is based on ML service time. As you know per the CBA, 172 ML service days constitutes 1 ML service year. The service time season clock starts on the first day of the regular season. The season clock weâ€™re looking for, however, starts on the first day of Spring Training. Is there any way you could calculate a column called â€œduty daysâ€� for us based on this instead of service time?
o	The MN piece is called â€œDays with Clubâ€� on the last tab. This could be the piece we use to calculate duty days, but I would like to know where the clock starts. Is it the day you were assigned there? Date of Spring Training start? Date of the first game? Ideally we should try to get this in line with what I mentioned above.
o	Once we settle on a good duty day calculation, we will have to calculate playersâ€™ % of duty days in CA in their last year with the CA affiliate or Club. We could take the days and divide them by 365 to get a %. To identify these players, can you add a current status for each player (such as voluntarily retired, inactive, etc.) and then calculate this for their last season? If this is too much to do in the report we generate, I can probably calculate it it myself, but at minimum Iâ€™ll need the current status for each player
â€¢	Season calculations:
o	First tab columns C and D (Major League CA years/days, which tie back to the second tab), are going to need tweaking. Pull up Rich Aurilia on the second tab and youâ€™ll see what I mean.
ï‚§	If we can get the â€œduty dayâ€� calculation instead of service time, can we add however many days span start of spring training to end of regular season = 1 season?
ï‚§	If not, and it has to be based on service time: As stated, 172 ML service days constitutes 1 ML service year. For Aurilia, youâ€™ll see he has 10 years with 172, and 3 incomplete years (one with 171, one with 28, and one with 65). Since he played parts of 13 seasons in CA, weâ€™ll want the first tab to show that. However it is saying 11 years and 92 days. Looks like you get this by taking the days from his 3 incomplete years (264, which is the same as 172+92). So youâ€™re tacking on one year to his existing 10 to get 11 years, and have 92 days left over.
â€¢	Sorry for not mentioning before, but not only do we want CA related days and seasons, we would like you to include columns for a playerâ€™s total days and seasons, so we can subtract and calculate non-CA related days and seasons (if you could do this directly in the report too that would be great).
â€¢	Third tab:
o	Can we add â€œClub Stateâ€� column next to A so we can have some way of bifurcating between CA affiliates and non-CA affiliates for CA Clubs
o	Can we convert â€œOrg IDâ€� to MLB Club

title: Switch AMT filestore from EBIS File to GCS
custom_steps: EBIS File is being replaced with GCS with the upcoming move to GKE. AMT currently hits the EBIS file db directly, and we'll need to update those calls to either download the file using ebis' global file download (preferred) or hit GCS directly instead. This will affect the displaying of image files such as Check In photos.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Users to be able to e-sign the DEVEL List NOD
custom_preconds: Club/Boc User is viewing a submitted/approved Place on Development List tx
custom_steps: WHEN club or boc user is viewing a submitted or approved Place on Development List transaction
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an esign button to users with the appropriate permissions (Submitted State)
AND Clicking "E-Sign" will open a menu for the user to select "Notice of Disposition".
AND The user will be able to complete the e-signature workflow for the Transfer transaction as per the standard MN NOD workflow including:
AND Submitting the form for e-signature
AND Rule check for Authorized Signatory that has a stored signature
AND Rule check that the form hasn't already been e-signed
AND Player Signature from both the Player Signature widget and the transaction itself
AND Club Signature Stamping
AND Transaction updates canceling e-signature
AND User cancellation of e-signature
AND Esign over email

title: As a BOC user, I want a BOC only version of the Player Service Report
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user navigates to Reports widget and runs 'Player Service Report' The BOC only version of the report should include National ID with a prompt option of "show: y/n". This report will be available to BOC only. (the club version is without National ID and is currently available in PRD)
custom_expected:
THEN he BOC only version of the report should include National ID with a prompt option of "show: y/n". 
AND This report will be available to BOC only. (the club version is without National ID and is currently available in PRD)

title: As a BOC Admin, I want an error to fire if a user attempts to select more than 8 coaches for the MJ Roster
custom_steps: WHEN user selects more than 8 coaches
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a rule check that fires on Save
AND IF there are 8 or less coaches select, system will Save
AND IF there are more than 8 coaches, an error message will fire:
  -- Heading: Error
  -- Body: You may only select 8 coaches to appear on the MJ Roster.  You currently have more than that.  Please revise your selections."
  -- Buttons: Back

title: As a BOC Admin I want the MJ Roster widget updated to only show Club specified coaches
custom_steps:
AC:
 - The MJ Roster report will be updated to only show coaches that have been specified by the Club
  -- They will have the flag set in a prior story
 - They may have up to 8 coaches
 - The coaches will continue to appear in alpha order at the bottom of the widget

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the MJ Roster Report Updated to Only Display Club Specified Coaches
custom_steps: WHEN user selects 8 coaches in roster widget
custom_expected:
THEN the MJ ROSTEr repor twill be update dto only show coaches that have been specified by the Club
AND they will have a flag set in a prior story
AND they may have up to 8 coaches
AND the coaches will continue to appear in alpha order on the printed report
AND this will impact the both the report run from the reporting page and the Mj roster widget
AND we should maintain the historical roster reports

title: As a Club Admin, I want to select the 8 coaches that will appear on the MJ Roster Report
custom_steps: WHEN users navigate to Employee Roster dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN theere will be a new 'Show on Roster' column added to the Employee Roster widget
AND there will be a 'Update Roster Report' button added to the widget
AND clicking the pencil icon put row into edit mode (pencil icon displays only for Major League level)
AND the 'Show On Roster' column into edit mode
AND every Active employee will have a checkbo
AND clicking Save will prompt user to confirm their changes
** If they confirm, their changes will be committed, blue banner displays, and widget will reload in View mode
** If they deny, modal will be dismissed.
AND selecting a coach will set a flag that can be used by reports and widgets
AND snapshots will need to look at this flag

title: As a developer, I want to clean up the logic for displaying employee profiles
As a BOC Admin, I want updates made to Rehab Assignments
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be limits to how many *minor league* players can be placed on rehab
** The limits will be configurable through the DB
** 3 may be assigned to High Class A
** 3 may be assigned to Low Class A
** New rule check to check how many players are currently on rehab at chosen rehab location

* Players from higher level affiliates may only be assigned to High A and Low A affiliates for rehab
** No rehab at 2A or 3A
** New rule to prevent rehab at these layers

* Change MJ 7 Day IL Rehab status to not count against the Domestic reserve count
* Warnings will need to be updated to account for the new limits

title: As a BOC Admin, I want a new warning added to MJ and MN Assignments that are created after 11pm
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be a new warning added to all MJ and MN Assignment Transactions:
** *Title*: Warning
** *Body*: You are entering this transaction near the time when the default Assignment Date will change.  Please confirm the date is accurate for this transaction.
** *Buttons*: Continue, Back
* This message will only fire between 11pm and 9am EST. 
* The warning will fire on both submission and approval for both BOC and Club users

----

INC0163115
Received from: jeff.pfeifer@mlb.com
Recipients: ebissupport@mlb.com,matthew.salvatore@mlb.com,Garrett.Horan@mlb.com,Reed.MacPhail@mlb.com,rreuter@lbisoftware.com,jeff.pfeifer@mlb.com

I would like to discuss making a change to the â€œAssignment Dateâ€� field in ebis to account for moves entered shortly after midnight.  One recommendation is that the assignment date for the transaction in ebis should not change to the following day until 9 am ET the next morning.  

As an example â€“ a Club enters a post-game option following a game played on 5/1, but that move is not submitted in ebis until at 12:30 am on 5/2.  The date of the transaction should remain 5/1 unless the user changes the date to 5/2.  This would protect the Clubs who are not focused on the date.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to change the MN TX backdating logic
custom_steps: * Change the backdating requirements for all minor league transactions to 24 hours (Currently 2 business days)

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Users to be able to e-sign the MN 60-IL SFD
custom_steps:
AC:
 - The SFD will be e-signable consistent with other SFDs

title: As a BOC Admin, I want updates made to MN Transactions
custom_steps:
AC:

* Players transferred to the Complex team must be remain there for a minimum of 7 days
** Allow less than 7 days if:
***  Player is selected or recalled to the ML Club
***  Player is replacing a player placed on the IL, TI, or other inactive list subsequent to his transfer
***  Other intervening change in circumstances occurs and BOC allows transfer
*** Club will be able to select a Player to Replace where applicable (similar to Recall before 10 days logic)
*** Specific to Transfers

* Clubs will get a blocking message when attempting to transfer a player to the Dominican Summer League
** Transfers to the DSL, require a BOC override to transfer players
* Remove any restrictions on who can be assigned where

title: As a BOC Admin, I want an SFD on the 60 Day MN IL
custom_steps:
WHEN viewing a MN 60 Day IL Transaction

MJ Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786601/Place+on+10+60-Day+DL|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786601/Place+on+10+60-Day+DL|smart-link] 

MJ 60-Day IL SFD: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786414/MJ+SFD+-+Place+on+10+Day+DL+Place+on+60+Day+DL+Layout|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786414/MJ+SFD+-+Place+on+10+Day+DL+Place+on+60+Day+DL+Layout|smart-link] 

Clipboard Notifications: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786724/DL+-+Clipboard|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786724/DL+-+Clipboard|smart-link]
custom_expected:
THEN There will be a new SFD created for the MN 60 Day IL placement
AND There will be a Received SFD checkbox added to the transaction
AND the checkbox will be disabled for CLub users if an attachment with a label of "Standard Form of Diagnosis" is not attached
AND a notification will be generated when a SFD is attached after the TX has been submitted (message #6)
AND if 3 days have passed since the TX was submitted w/o a SFD, a notification will be generated (message 7)

title: As a BOC Admin, I want updates made to the Domestic Reserve Count
custom_steps:
AC:
 - Optioned players only count during minor league season
 - Development list players count
 - 7 Day IL players count
 - Temporarily inactive players count
 - Add a new â€œReserve_Count_Flagâ€� flag for newly signed players.  
  -- Flag is set upon signing a first year contract and becoming a professional
  -- Flag will show as a BOC only check box on profile as â€œCounts against Reserve Limitâ€�, when it is checked.  BOC can uncheck the value, but once its unset it will no longer show (I think that makes the most sense, but we could change this.  If you recheck it though, the batch may well uncheck it, so this doesnâ€™t have much utility) 
  -- A nightly batch will check all flagged players to see if a player has been signed for more than 15 days, if so, the flag is set
  -- Batch will also check to see if they have any game log stats (for MiLB teams only), if so the flag is set
  -- Update the rule when signing a new MNC to display a different message if the player wonâ€™t count for 15 days, but would put the club over the limit if nothing is changed
 - Do not count other IL statuses or 60 day IL

title: Remove the under control limit for the Rookie level of play on the rosters widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN it is off season (outside of this date range: 1st day of minor lg system date until the 'Last game of WS system date + 5 days)
custom_steps: WHEN complex league is in the 'Off Season' The Complex league teams (formerly spring training facilities) were decided to be Rookie level of play, as a result we need to remove the under control limit on the Roster widget for Rookie level of play.
custom_expected: THEN do not show an 'Under Control' limit for Rookie Level of play teams

title: Update Bonus Batch Logic for 2020 Contingency Bonuses
custom_steps:
Normally, a Contingency Bonus can only be earned in the start year of the contract.  However, there was no MN season in 2020, so no one could earn it.  Because of this, we need to update the batch to say â€œif the start year is 2020, the bonus can also be earned in 2021.â€�

Those bonuses should read as Potential, rather than Canceled.

title: Create Error in Club Comm Batch if Duplicate Club IDs exist
custom_steps:
Value:  CLUB IDs occasionally get reused and this can lead to more than one club having the same ID.  This creates errors in ebis and can lead to WL Game reports not being created

AC:
 - If there is more than one Club with the same BAM ID, an alert will be created in the Club Comm Batch .

title: Read EBIS Files from GCS
custom_steps: To complete our EBIS File to GCS migration, update the existing code to pull files/images from GCS and remove the connection to EBIS File DB

title: Update DPL Endpoint to Accommodate New Consent to Reslect Flow
Create New EBIS Permission (EBIS-LINK-ADMIN)
custom_steps: Create a new permission in EBIS (EBIS-LINK-ADMIN) that will be used by the EBIS Link Okta Application account.  It should be ensured that this permission is not deleted during database refreshes.

title: Update DPL API to Require a Submission
custom_steps:
Currently, DPL is capable of submitted players to ebis without an accompanying draft submission.  This is is not a valid flow and creates issues in ebis.

AC:
 -  The DPL API will be updated to require DPL to include a submission for a new player
  -- This applies to any new player or to an existing player for a new year

title: As an AMT Admin, I want a "Did Not Travel" column added to the Travel Auth widget on Prospect Profiles
custom_steps:
Data Discover:
[https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789841/Prospect+Profile|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789841/Prospect+Profile]

Wireframes:
Prospect Profile: [https://zpl.io/bPPk5GA|https://zpl.io/bPPk5GA]
Prospect Profile Mobile: [https://zpl.io/adkDMd7|https://zpl.io/adkDMd7]
Travel Auth Form: [https://zpl.io/V1wdB8B|https://zpl.io/V1wdB8B]

AC:

* There will be a new "Did Not Travel" column added to the Travel Authorization widget on the Prospect Profile
* If the "Did Not Travel" checkbox on the respective Travel Auth Form is checked, a checkmark is displayed in this column

title: As a developer, I want to make make the AMT approaching threshold a configurable ebis_constant
custom_steps:
AC:
- Each period will have its own ebis_constant
-  daysLimitFromSystemValues - threshold will be calculated for each period  

Reference:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789751/Prospect+Statuses

Note:
Players who are 0-6 Months From Signing will no longer be allotted 15 days in a 45 day period, they will now be allotted 45 days in a 90 day period 
PIVOTAL-711
